<Overload retVal="Function" descr="Sets the AppPackage to the device's current focus. Requires a connected device." >
<Overload retVal="Function" descr="Sets the AppPackage to {p}. Requires a connected device." >

<Overload retVal="Function" descr="Checks the current screen against {t} and invokes {s} if it passes or {f} if it fails" >
<Overload retVal="Function" descr="Checks the current screen against {t} and invokes {s} if it passes or {f} if it fails" >

<Overload retVal="Extension" descr="Print() and PrintLine() extension, which appends {t} to the end of the printed text" >

<Overload retVal="Extension" descr="Gets the item at index {i} in an array" >

<Overload retVal="Extension" descr="Stops the extended timer." >
